title: Eminem - MMLP2 - Straight to the Verse REMIX [FLAC]
description:
EMINEM's 2013 Marshall Mathers LP 2 remixed to highlight the verses.

Some subjectively judged "less interesting" verses or verse parts have been omitted.

For those interested in technical specs, there is no audio clipping in these files,
and only FLAC (lossless) files have been used to remix.
